item.title: Chernobylite Complete Edition for Switch launches December 13
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/chernobylite-complete-edition-for-switch-launches-december-13

  • Switch

First Switch gameplay trailer released.

Chernobylite Complete Edition will launch for Switch via Nintendo eShop on December 13, publisher Untold Tales and developer The Farm 51 announced.

Chernobylite first launched in Early Access for PC on October 16, 2019, followed by a full release for PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG on July 28, 2021, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One on September 28, 2021, and PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series on April 21, 2022.

Here is an overview of the game, via Untold Tales:

About

The game will be available in two forms. The Chernobylite Complete Edition comes with the full base game and all content updates to date, including extra story missions, new locations, additional weapons, unique game modes and more.

The Chernobylite Premium Edition comes with all the above plus digital downloads of the official Chernobylite Soundtrack and Artbook along with two cosmetic weapons and hideout

Downloadable contents include “The Seasoned Scavenger” and “Irradiated Hideout.”

Key Features

  • Base Building and Crafting – Build and customize your home base to serve all your operations and expeditions. Expand and upgrade to suit your needs and those of your companions. Use workstations to craft powerful gadgets, traps, and weapons, or fine-tune your existing gear to gain an edge in your excursions.
  • Resource and Team Management – Recruit a diverse group of skilled companions to join you on your journey. Assign them to missions to gather resources, scout new areas, or eliminate threats. Manage your base to meet their needs and keep morale high, all while making tough story choices that will shape their loyalty to you.
  • Stealth, Survival, and Combat – Survival in The Exclusion Zone is tough, as each day brings fresh challenges and diminishing supplies. Venture out on supply runs, use stealth to evade detection, or engage in intense combat when necessary. Navigate through perilous environments and face formidable enemies, all while ensuring you extract back to base to keep your scavenged loot.
  • Non-Linear Storytelling and Choices – No playthrough is the same. Your choices and actions shape your story, but no decision will satisfy everyone. Choose carefully whom to trust, whether to prioritize resources for survival or research and when to face conflicts head-on or avoid them. Every decision carries weight and leads to different outcomes.

item.title: Virtual reality puzzle adventure game Mare for PS VR2 now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/virtual-reality-puzzle-adventure-game-mare-for-ps-vr2-now-available

Virtual reality puzzle adventure game Mare is now available for PlayStation VR2 via PlayStation Store for $24.99, developer Lonekite Games announced.

MareSteamVR on March 31, 2022, and iOS via App Store on January 19, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via Lonekite Games:

About

As you wake up, stirred from a dreamless sleep with an unknown purpose, you find yourself in the strange lands of Mare embodying a mysterious mechanical bird.

Crossing paths with a helpless companion you venture deep into unknown territory on a puzzling adventure while unraveling a mysterious narrative and the secrets hidden within. All in order to ensure the arrival of the companion at her impending destiny.

Key Features

  • Full Eye-Tracking only gameplay option available.
  • Explore the vast and strange landscapes from a viewpoint of a mechanical bird.
  • Guide and protect a vulnerable AI companion on her unexpected adventure.
  • Explore and discover the underlying narrative spanning over eight chapters.
  • Immerse yourself in the ambient atmosphere and otherworldly music for a soothing experience.
  • Search for lost artifacts hidden throughout the world in order to unlock the final secret of Mare.

Watch a new trailer below.

item.title: Masters of Light coming to PS VR2 on December 18
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/masters-of-light-coming-to-ps-vr2-on-december-18

  • PS VR2
  • PS5

Virtual reality action game currently available for Quest 2 and 3.

COVEN will release virtual reality action game Masters of Light for PlayStation VR2 on December 18, the developer announced.

Masters of Light first launched for Quest 2 and Quest 3 on May 16, 2024. A SteamVR release is also planned, but a COVEN representative told Gematsu a release date has yet to be decided.

Here is an overview of the game, via COVEN:

About

Shadows are threatening the galaxy and it’s up to you to join the fight!

Feel the pulse of Masters of Light, an electrifying action game where you challenge yourself and other players with superpowers of light !

Conquer 36 levels with unlimited replay, upgrade five skills, and become a superhero—the ultimate “Master of Light.” Unleash your inner badass in virtual reality with pinpoint accuracy, powered by eye-tracking-enhanced aiming. Feel the thrill of every attack with the PlayStation VR2 Sense controllers’ haptics, and amplify the intensity of each battle through headset vibrations—making every combat uniquely immersive.

Fight, workout and dance to our intense synthwave soundtrack while exploring breathtaking VR environments. Climb up the leaderboards and unlock the many trophies.

The galaxy needs you!

Will you be strong enough to face what awaits you at the heart of the Black Hole?

Key Features

  • Two ways to play: hand-tracking or controllers.
  • Three difficulty modes: easy / normal / hard.
  • Five superpowers to master and upgrade, including freezing time!
  • Seven types of enemies.
  • 20 trophies to unlock.
  • 36 levels.
  • Leaderboards to challenge your friends and unlock new achievements.
  • Unlimited replay to improve your score!
  • Available in English, French, German, Spanish, Japanese, and Simplified Chinese.

item.title: Life is Strange: Double Exposure for Switch launches November 19
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/life-is-strange-double-exposure-for-switch-launches-november-19

  • Switch

Physical edition includes the full game on the cart.

The Switch version of Life is Strange: Double Exposure will launch digitally on November 19, publisher Square Enix and developer Deck Nine Games announced. A physical edition will follow on January 28, 2025.

Pre-orders for the physical edition are available now, which include a SteelBook pre-order bonus at select retailers. The physical edition includes the full game on a 16 gigabyte cart.

Life is Strange: Double Exposure first launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on October 29.

Here is a brief overview of the game, via Square Enix:

In Life is Strange: Double Exposure, players step into the boots of Max Caulfield, photographer-in-residence at the prestigious Caledon University. After discovering her closest new friend Safi dead in the snow, Max tries to Rewind time—a power she’s not used in years—but instead, opens the way to a parallel timeline where Safi is still alive, and still in danger! Max realizes the killer will soon strike again—in both versions of reality. Only Max can Shift between the two parallel timelines to solve and prevent the same murder.

Watch a new trailer below. View the first set of Switch screenshots at the gallery.
